00053 struct lu_nid_range {
00054         /* unique id set by mgs */
00055         unsigned int             rn_id;
00056         /* lu_nodemap containing this range */
00057         struct lu_nodemap       *rn_nodemap;
00058         /* list for nodemap */
00059         struct list_head         rn_list;
00060         /* nid interval tree */
00061         struct interval_node     rn_node;
00062 };
00063 
00064 struct lu_idmap {
00065         /* uid/gid of client */
00066         __u32           id_client;
00067         /* uid/gid on filesystem */
00068         __u32           id_fs;
00069         /* tree mapping client ids to filesystem ids */
00070         struct rb_node  id_client_to_fs;
00071         /* tree mappung filesystem to client */
00072         struct rb_node  id_fs_to_client;
00073 };
00074 
00075 struct nodemap_range_tree {
00076         struct interval_node *nmrt_range_interval_root;
00077         unsigned int nmrt_range_highest_id;
00078 };
00079 
00080 struct nodemap_config {
00081         /* Highest numerical lu_nodemap.nm_id defined */
00082         unsigned int nmc_nodemap_highest_id;
00083 
00084         /* Simple flag to determine if nodemaps are active */
00085         bool nmc_nodemap_is_active;
00086 
00087         /* Pointer to default nodemap as it is needed more often */
00088         struct lu_nodemap *nmc_default_nodemap;
00089 
00093         struct rw_semaphore nmc_range_tree_lock;
00094         struct nodemap_range_tree nmc_range_tree;
00095 
00100         struct cfs_hash *nmc_nodemap_hash;
00101 };
00102 
00103 /* first 4 bits of the nodemap_id is the index type */
00104 struct nodemap_key {
00105         __u32 nk_nodemap_id;
00106         union {
00107                 __u32 nk_range_id;
00108                 __u32 nk_id_client;
00109                 __u32 nk_unused;
00110         };
00111 };
00112 
00113 enum nodemap_idx_type {
00114         NODEMAP_EMPTY_IDX = 0,          /* index created with blank record */
00115         NODEMAP_CLUSTER_IDX = 1,        /* a nodemap cluster of nodes */
00116         NODEMAP_RANGE_IDX = 2,          /* nid range assigned to a nm cluster */
00117         NODEMAP_UIDMAP_IDX = 3,         /* uid map assigned to a nm cluster */
00118         NODEMAP_GIDMAP_IDX = 4,         /* gid map assigned to a nm cluster */
00119         NODEMAP_GLOBAL_IDX = 15,        /* stores nodemap activation status */
00120 };
00121 
00122 #define NM_TYPE_MASK 0x0FFFFFFF
00123 #define NM_TYPE_SHIFT 28
00124 
00125 static inline enum nodemap_idx_type nm_idx_get_type(unsigned int id)
00126 {
00127         return id >> NM_TYPE_SHIFT;
00128 }
00129 
00130 static inline __u32 nm_idx_set_type(unsigned int id, enum nodemap_idx_type t)
00131 {
00132         return (id & NM_TYPE_MASK) | (t << NM_TYPE_SHIFT);
00133 }

00193 struct rb_node *nm_rb_next_postorder(const struct rb_node *node);
00194 struct rb_node *nm_rb_first_postorder(const struct rb_root *root);
00195 void nodemap_putref(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap);
00196 
00197 #define nm_rbtree_postorder_for_each_entry_safe(pos, n,                 \
00198                                                 root, field)            \
00199         for (pos = nm_rb_first_postorder(root) ?                        \
00200                 rb_entry(nm_rb_first_postorder(root), typeof(*pos),     \
00201                 field) : NULL,                                          \
00202                 n = (pos && nm_rb_next_postorder(&pos->field)) ?        \
00203                 rb_entry(nm_rb_next_postorder(&pos->field),             \
00204                 typeof(*pos), field) : NULL;                            \
00205                 pos != NULL;                                            \
00206                 pos = n,                                                \
00207                 n = (pos && nm_rb_next_postorder(&pos->field)) ?        \
00208                 rb_entry(nm_rb_next_postorder(&pos->field),             \
00209                 typeof(*pos), field) : NULL)
00210
